creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: hair pin is a thin, flat piece of silver with a very rounded tip; half way up the pin there is a wire loop sticking out of the center; near the top of the pin there is a medallion filled with lines etched in; border of fish with a face in the center at the top; border of two strands of coiled wire; fringe with five chains, each with a sphere on the bottom; these chains dangle down from the top
object_name: Hair pin, one of a pair
title: Hair pin, one of a pair
